original_text: Beside their manservants and their maidservants, of whom there were seven thousand three hundred thirty and seven: and they had two hundred forty and five singing men and singing women.
korean_text: 그 외에 노비가 칠천삼백삼십칠 명이요 그들에게 노래하는 남녀가 이백사십오 명이 있었고

sentences.original_text: Beside their manservants and their maidservants
of whom there were seven thousand three hundred thirty and seven
and they had two hundred forty and five singing men
sentences.korean_translation: 그들에게는 이백사십오 명의 남자 가수가 있었고
